Related repos

  • Open source tool for editing and documenting OpenAPI and AsyncAPI definitions
  • auto-generates Swagger docs for APIs
  • API code, client, server, docs, config from OpenAPI spec
  • cross-platform API client for testing, visualizing, and integrating APIs
  • Generates API reference documentation from OpenAPI specifications
  • Generates OpenAPI specifications from network requests
  • Python web framework for building APIs
  • Middleware and dashboard for API monitoring
  • self-hosted interface for running and managing AI models like Ollama and OpenAI-compatible APIs
  • turn mitmproxy traffic into OpenAPI specs automatically
